Fiorella and Jason Press were married in a destination wedding in Costa Rica

article_metadata.news-keywords: Creating Revolutions, technology, restaurant, employee, table-top, ordering system, Einer Rosenberg, NFC, Near Field Communications
article_metadata.description: A Miami tech startup that aims to improve customer service in the hospitality and retail sectors is being used by Miami-area restaurants and has picked up a big global distributor for its first product.
article_metadata.title: Creating Revolutions in the hospitality industry | Miami Herald
